sentences.en: As the man was unemployed, the Council decided to write off the arrears of rent.
sentences.cn: 因为这个人失业, 地方议会决定取消其欠租.

sentences.en: Davies finished almost two seconds in arrears for third place.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯落后了差不多两秒，获得第三名。

sentences.en: He is in arrears with his work.
His defect caused arrears of work to build up in the court.
sentences.cn: 他的缺点使法院的工作积压起来.

sentences.en: I am two or three letters in arrears.
sentences.cn: 我还有两三封信搁着未复.

sentences.en: I have fallen into arrears with my rent.
Many people are in arrears with their rent.
Most of his other few possessions had long since been sold to pay arrears of rent.
sentences.cn: 他的其他一些不多的财产大部分都早已被变卖还了欠租.

sentences.en: she finished ten metres in arrears.
sentences.cn: 比赛结束时，她落后了十米。

sentences.en: The payments on that car loan are in arrears by three months.
sentences.cn: 购车贷款的偿付被拖欠了三个月.

sentences.en: They are urgent for payment of arrears of wages.
They have promised to pay the arrears over the next five years.
sentences.cn: 他们保证在随后的5年内偿付逾期债款。

sentences.en: They were in arrears with their mortgage , so their home was repossessed.
sentences.cn: 他们未按时还按揭贷款, 所以房子被收回了.

sentences.en: Those bosses arrears of wages has not yet been paid.
sentences.cn: 那些老板拖欠的工资至今尚未付清.

sentences.en: Thousands of its customers are in arrears with loans and mortgage payments.
sentences.cn: 有数千客户拖欠其贷款和抵押贷款还款。

sentences.en: two out of three tenants are in arrears.
Unemployment benefit is paid fortnightly in arrears.
sentences.cn: 失业救济金延后两个星期支付。

sentences.en: We must mop up the arrears of work.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把耽误的工作做完.

words.tran_cn: [会计]拖欠；待完成的事；应付欠款

phrases.phrase: in arrears 亦作 主律
phrases.tran_cn: (赛跑或其他体育比赛中的选手）落后于其他选手的

trans.tran_cn: 拖欠，（工作等的）拖延，欠款，待完成的事
trans.tran_en: if someone is in arrears, or if their payments are in arrears, they are late in paying something that they should pay regularly, such as rent
